attributes.action: A vote of no confidence and hold a new general election.
attributes.additional_details:
Handicapping ourselves during an emergency for political gain (https://www.politico.eu/article/britain-top-diplomat-simon-mcdonald-uk-opt-out-of-eu-ventilator-scheme-was-political/)
Money wasted on plane painting, PPE contracts being given to shady companies in offshore tax havens (https://inews.co.uk/news/health/government-ppe-contract-private-equity-tax-haven-494587), blame passed from our leaders to frontline workers. If our leaders can't put the country first we must ask ourselves who might.
attributes.background: The governments handling of the Covid situation has been appalling, in light of the handling of this crisis I know I lack any confidence in the government to be able to handle our economic recovery after this let alone Brexit on top of that. It is time to review our government
